languages.text: {n}Бархатный голос убаюкивает, вводит в транс.{/n} "Вместе они пировали краденным счастьем, возводили дворцы, завоевывали миры, любили друг друга... О, как они любили друг друга. Они сгорали и обновлялись в этой любви. А потом... Я не помню, чем закончилась эта сказка". {n}Джай улыбается.{/n} "Как думаешь, что ждало их в конце?"

{n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"
languages.original_text: {n}Бархатный голос убаюкивает, вводит в транс.{/n} "Вместе они пировали краденным счастьем, возводили дворцы, завоевывали миры, любили друг друга... О, как они любили друг друга. Они сгорали и обновлялись в этой любви. А потом... Я не помню, чем закончилась эта сказка". {n}Джай улыбается.{/n} "Как думаешь, что ждало их в конце?"

Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

languages.text: {n}她的声音如同天鹅绒一般，让你沉醉不已。{/n}“于是，他们一起享受着偷来的幸福。他们建造了无数城堡，征服了无数世界。他们彼此相爱……噢，他们是如此相爱，他们在爱意中燃烧，在爱火中重生。接下来嘛……我已经不记得这个故事的结局了。”{n}婕伊笑着问道。{/n}“你觉得，他们会迎来什么样的结局？”
languages.original_text: {n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}她的声音如同天鹅绒一般，让你沉醉不已。{/n}“于是，他们一起享受着偷来的幸福。他们建造了无数城堡，征服了无数世界。他们彼此相爱……噢，他们是如此相爱，他们在爱意中燃烧，在爱火中重生。接下来嘛……我已经不记得这个故事的结局了。”{n}婕伊笑着问道。{/n}“你觉得，他们会迎来什么样的结局？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n} 彼女の薄衣のような声が、あなたを恍惚の世界へと誘う。{/n}「そして彼らは、奪った幸福に舌鼓をうつ ― 城を築き、世界を征服し、愛し合った…ああ、その愛がどれほどのものだったか。その愛に燃え、生まれ変わった。そして…物語の結末は覚えていないの」{n}ジェイは微笑む。 {/n}「あんたは、どんな結末が待っていたと思う？」
languages.original_text: {n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n} 彼女の薄衣のような声が、あなたを恍惚の世界へと誘う。{/n}「そして彼らは、奪った幸福に舌鼓をうつ ― 城を築き、世界を征服し、愛し合った…ああ、その愛がどれほどのものだったか。その愛に燃え、生まれ変わった。そして…物語の結末は覚えていないの」{n}ジェイは微笑む。 {/n}「あんたは、どんな結末が待っていたと思う？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Su voz de terciopelo te sume en un trance.{/n} «Junt{mf|o|a}s festejaron su felicidad robada. Construyeron castillos, conquistaron mundos y se amaron... vaya si se amaron. Ardieron y renacieron en su amor. Y entonces... No recuerdo cómo terminaba la historia». {n}Jae sonríe.{/n} «¿Qué final cree que les esperaba?».
languages.original_text: {n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su voz de terciopelo te sume en un trance.{/n} «Junt{mf|o|a}s festejaron su felicidad robada. Construyeron castillos, conquistaron mundos y se amaron... vaya si se amaron. Ardieron y renacieron en su amor. Y entonces... No recuerdo cómo terminaba la historia». {n}Jae sonríe.{/n} «¿Qué final cree que les esperaba?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sa voix de velours vous fait entrer en transe.{/n} « Et ensemble, {mf|ils|elles} se régalèrent de ce bonheur volé ; {mf|ils|elles} bâtirent des châteaux, conquirent des mondes et s'aimèrent... Oh oui, {mf|ils|elles} s'aimèrent avec passion. Cet amour les réduisit en cendres et les fit renaître. Et alors... Je ne me souviens plus de la fin, {n}dit Jae en souriant.{/n} À votre avis, comment s'est terminée leur histoire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sa voix de velours vous fait entrer en transe.{/n} « Et ensemble, {mf|ils|elles} se régalèrent de ce bonheur volé ; {mf|ils|elles} bâtirent des châteaux, conquirent des mondes et s'aimèrent... Oh oui, {mf|ils|elles} s'aimèrent avec passion. Cet amour les réduisit en cendres et les fit renaître. Et alors... Je ne me souviens plus de la fin, {n}dit Jae en souriant.{/n} À votre avis, comment s'est terminée leur histoire ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ihre samtige Stimme versetzt dich in Trance.{/n} "Und gemeinsam feierten sie ihr gestohlenes Glück – sie errichteten Schlösser, sie eroberten Welten, sie liebten sich ... Oh, und wie sehr sie sich liebten. Sie verbrannten an ihrer Liebe und wurden in ihr wiedergeboren. Und dann ... Ich weiß nicht mehr, wie die Geschichte endet." {n}Jae lächelt.{/n} "Wie ging die Geschichte für sie aus, was glaubt Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

Oh, und wie sehr sie sich liebten. Sie verbrannten an ihrer Liebe und wurden in ihr wiedergeboren. Und dann ... Ich weiß nicht mehr, wie die Geschichte endet." {n}Jae lächelt.{/n} "Wie ging die Geschichte für sie aus, was glaubt Ihr?"

Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

languages.text: {n}Kadifemsi sesiyle seni transa sürüklüyor.{/n} "Çalıntı mutluluğun tadına ikisi birlikte varmış. Kaleler kurmuşlar, dünyalar fethetmişler, birbirlerini çok sevmişler. Ah, hem de nasıl sevmişler. Yanmışlar ve o aşkın içinde yeniden doğmuşlar. Sonra... Hikâye nasıl bitiyor hatırlayamadım." {n}Jae gülümsüyor.{/n} "Sence onları ne bekliyordu dersin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her velvety voice lulls you into a trance.{/n} "And together they feasted on their stolen happiness — they built castles, they conquered worlds, they loved one another... Oh, how they loved one another. They burned and were reborn in that love. And then... I don't remember how the story ends." {n}Jae smiles.{/n} "What ending awaited them, do you think?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadifemsi sesi seni bir transa doğru sürüklüyor.{/n} "Ve çalıntı mutluluğun tadına ikisi birlikte varmış. Kaleler kurmuşlar, dünyalar fethetmişler, birbirlerini çok sevmişler. Ah, hem de nasıl sevmişler. Yanmışlar ve o aşkın içinde yeniden doğmuşlar. Sonra... Hikâye nasıl bitiyor hatırlayamadım." {n}Jae gülümsüyor.{/n} "Sence onları ne bekliyordu dersin?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
